sentences.sContent: Do you enjoy reading before bedtime?
sentences.sCn: 你享受睡前的阅读时光吗？

sentences.sContent: So learn to enjoy reading and read a lot.
sentences.sCn: 所以学会享受阅读并且多多地读吧。

sentences.sContent: If you enjoy reading, then by all means do that whenever you want.
sentences.sCn: 如果你喜欢阅读，不管什么时候，都要想尽一切办法去读。
